title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: Love and death in a utopian community, the remorseless business of slavery,  a passion for peacocks, updating Sir Gawain and more.
body:
To a generation thirsty for spiritual sustenance, India was irresistible. A trust fund helped. Review by Tunku Varadarajan
Read the review
A historian argues that the greatest force behind the legal marvel of the Constitution may have been fear. Review by Brendan Simms
Read the review
